languages.text: "Это суждение истинно. Однако я пошел на данный шаг из преданности к своему наставнику. Отринув осторожность, он вел нас к богохульной войне, в которой сам стал бы первой и главной жертвой. Я не желал становиться свидетелем его гибели и попытался принудить его к покорности".

traits.locale_text: "Это суждение истинно. Однако я пошел на данный шаг из преданности к своему наставнику. Отринув осторожность, он вел нас к богохульной войне, в которой сам стал бы первой и главной жертвой. Я не желал становиться свидетелем его гибели и попытался принудить его к покорности".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "This statement is true. However, I took this step out of loyalty to my mentor. He rejected caution and was leading us to a blasphemous war where he would become the first and most important victim. I did not want to witness his destruction and tried to force him to submit."
languages.original_text: "Это суждение истинно. Однако я пошел на данный шаг из преданности к своему наставнику. Отринув осторожность, он вел нас к богохульной войне, в которой сам стал бы первой и главной жертвой. Я не желал становиться свидетелем его гибели и попытался принудить его к покорности".

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. However, I took this step out of loyalty to my mentor. He rejected caution and was leading us to a blasphemous war where he would become the first and the most important victim. I did not want to witness his destruction and tried to force him to submit."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. However, I took this step out of loyalty to my mentor. He rejected caution and was leading us to a blasphemous war where he would become the first and the most important victim. I did not want to witness his destruction and tried to force him to submit."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. However, I took this step out of loyalty to my mentor. He rejected caution and was leading us to a blasphemous war where he would become the first and most important victim. I did not want to witness his destruction and tried to force him to submit."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. However, I took this step out of loyalty to my mentor. He rejected caution and was leading us to a blasphemous war where he would become the first and most important victim. I did not want to witness his destruction and tried to force him to submit."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is true. However, I took this step out of loyalty to my mentor. He rejected caution and was leading us to a blasphemous war where he would become the first and most important victim. I did not want to witness his destruction and tried to force him to submit."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。然而，我之所以走出这一步，却是源于对导师的忠诚。他不肯谨慎行事，准备带领我们发动一场亵渎性的战争。这场战争一旦爆发，他就会成为第一个、也是最首要的受害者。我不想目睹他殒灭，于是我试图令他屈服。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. However, I took this step out of loyalty to my mentor. He rejected caution and was leading us to a blasphemous war where he would become the first and most important victim. I did not want to witness his destruction and tried to force him to submit."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。然而，我之所以走出这一步，却是源于对导师的忠诚。他不肯谨慎行事，准备带领我们发动一场亵渎性的战争。这场战争一旦爆发，他就会成为第一个、也是最首要的受害者。我不想目睹他殒灭，于是我试图令他屈服。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. Sin embargo, di este paso por lealtad a mi mentor. Rechazaba la cautela y nos llevaba a una guerra blasfema en la que se convertiría en la primera víctima. Al no querer presenciar su destrucción, intenté obligarle a someterse».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. However, I took this step out of loyalty to my mentor. He rejected caution and was leading us to a blasphemous war where he would become the first and most important victim. I did not want to witness his destruction and tried to force him to submit."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. Sin embargo, di este paso por lealtad a mi mentor. Rechazaba la cautela y nos llevaba a una guerra blasfema en la que se convertiría en la primera víctima. Al no querer presenciar su destrucción, intenté obligarle a someterse».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この言葉は真実だ。しかし、私は師への忠誠心からこの一歩を踏み出した。彼は警戒心を拒絶し、私たちを冒涜的な戦争へと導こうとしていた。私は彼の破滅を目撃したくなかった。ゆえに、彼に服従を強要しようとしたのだ」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. However, I took this step out of loyalty to my mentor. He rejected caution and was leading us to a blasphemous war where he would become the first and most important victim. I did not want to witness his destruction and tried to force him to submit."

traits.locale_text: 「この言葉は真実だ。しかし、私は師への忠誠心からこの一歩を踏み出した。彼は警戒心を拒絶し、私たちを冒涜的な戦争へと導こうとしていた。私は彼の破滅を目撃したくなかった。ゆえに、彼に服従を強要しようとしたのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Ich bin diesen Schritt jedoch aus Loyalität gegenüber meinem Mentor gegangen. Er hat die Vorsicht aufgegeben und wollte uns in einen blasphemistischen Krieg führen, in dem er das erste und wichtigste Opfer geworden wäre. Ich wollte nicht Zeuge seiner Zerstörung werden, und habe daher versucht, ihn zu einer Unterwerfung zu zwingen."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. However, I took this step out of loyalty to my mentor. He rejected caution and was leading us to a blasphemous war where he would become the first and most important victim. I did not want to witness his destruction and tried to force him to submit."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Ich bin diesen Schritt jedoch aus Loyalität gegenüber meinem Mentor gegangen. Er hat die Vorsicht aufgegeben und wollte uns in einen blasphemistischen Krieg führen, in dem er das erste und wichtigste Opfer geworden wäre. Ich wollte nicht Zeuge seiner Zerstörung werden, und habe daher versucht, ihn zu einer Unterwerfung zu zwingen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Cependant, j'ai agi par fidélité envers lui. Au mépris de la prudence, il nous conduisait droit vers une guerre blasphématoire dont il aurait été la première et la plus importante victime. Je ne voulais pas être témoin de sa destruction, j'ai donc tenté de le forcer à se soumettre. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. However, I took this step out of loyalty to my mentor. He rejected caution and was leading us to a blasphemous war where he would become the first and most important victim. I did not want to witness his destruction and tried to force him to submit."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est vraie. Cependant, j'ai agi par fidélité envers lui. Au mépris de la prudence, il nous conduisait droit vers une guerre blasphématoire dont il aurait été la première et la plus importante victime. Je ne voulais pas être témoin de sa destruction, j'ai donc tenté de le forcer à se soumettre. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "This statement is true. However, I took this step out of loyalty to my mentor. He rejected caution and was leading us to a blasphemous war where he would become the first and most important victim. I did not want to witness his destruction and tried to force him to submit."

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Bu adımı yönderime duyduğum sadakat nedeniyle attım. Temkini reddetmişti ve bizi, kendisinin ilk ve en önemli kurban olacağı din dışı bir savaşa sürüklüyordu. Onun yok oluşuna şahitlik etmek istemedim, onu boyun eğmeye zorlamaya çalıştım."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. However, I took this step out of loyalty to my mentor. He rejected caution and was leading us to a blasphemous war where he would become the first and most important victim. I did not want to witness his destruction and tried to force him to submit."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru. Bu adımı yönderime duyduğum sadakat nedeniyle attım ama. Temkini reddetti ve bizi, kendisinin ilk ve en önemli kurban olacağı din dışı bir savaşa sürüklüyordu. Onun yok oluşuna şahitlik etmek istemedim ve onu boyun eğmeye zorlamaya çalıştım."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
